name: Spectrum Interactive
tag_list: internet-desks, wifi-hotspot, wi-fi-hotspot, airports, printing-services, koisks, travel-services
overview:
Spectrum Interactive is a market leader in WiFi, Internet Desks, Payphones and printing solutions, in the UK Travel and Hospitality sectors.

The Travel Division is totally focused on providing a full complement of WiFi and Kiosk internet access services to airports, motorway services, bus, coach and train stations, ports and marinas. Market leader of public access internet provision in UK airports with services in operation at over 20 airports across UK

Spectrum was a pioneer of internet kiosks into UK airports in 2000 and the service has since become established as a central part of the airport experience. We have developed mutually beneficial long term relationships with partners such as BAA, Manchester Airports Group, Birmingham and Bristol Airports & each year demand for the service has increased.

The team is working on developing further services with its airport clients and has already introduced several new features to passengers such as (22+) airport printing sites, quick access to social networking sites, online games and headphones to improve the enjoyment of favourite websites such as BBC iPlayer and YouTube. Additional opportunities include airline lounges, with 25 already using Spectrum’s WiFi services.

Spectrum has become a market leader in the hospitality sector and provides WiFi and Kiosk Internet Access to over 1000 hotels in the UK.

Spectrumâ€™s Hotel Platform (HSP) has been specifically designed to meet the needs of our hospitality clients as they strive to enhance, streamline and differentiate the guest experience. As part of our commitment to this market, we have listened carefully to the evolving demands of both major hotel chains and independent, boutique hoteliers alike. We have analysed key trends in the industry to gain insight into exactly what guests want, and more importantly - as technology has become more advanced, opening up a whole host of new ways to communicate and be entertained - what they have come to expect.
